name: Baunsudaun
summary:
See how long you can survive in Baunsudaun and compete for your personal best score.

In Baunsudaun you control 'Blob' by moving him left or right. There are 7 different types of platforms that will spawn all with different effects. Your goal is to avoid the spikes on the ceiling, and avoid touching the fire at the bottom by trying to use the platforms to keep Blob alive as long as possible. While all this is going on, the lines will continually move faster making it more difficult the higher your score gets.
